column5: RIG ESV DO all held in position for another leg down after analysts comments destroying SDRL Entire Market is fragile and showing ptsd behavior after each potus tweet removes 23 of retail share values Im selling each minuscule bounce not shorting as never know when tweet will dishonestly say we have a deal Only to be followed by Im not ready to make a deal we are in times that require defensive positioning
ESV Weve seen the bottom imo
